message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a wide range of features that will enhance your experience significantly. Considering its value and quality, I would like to propose an offer of $12,000 for it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, my budget for this is somewhat lower. Would you be open to a price closer to $9,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To find a middle ground, I would like to propose an offer of $10,500 for the product. This still allows us both to benefit from the transaction while considering your financial situation.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be totally honest, $10,000 is the highest I can go.  I'm ready to finalize the deal at that price if you're agreeable.
